name: next-caltrain-pwa
description: This is a Caltrain Schedule for modern Alcatel flip phones. The Alcatel `GO FLIP` and `SMARTFLIP` phones run on `KaiOS` which incorporates a modern Firefox browser with geo location capabilities. The `SMARTFLIP` supports full-screen mode but the `GO FLIP` does not, so this scredule will function in both modes.
